title: In ‘Splatoon 3,’ gamers ‘memorialize’ Queen Elizabeth II with memes
description: "Splatoon 3" was released hours after Queen Elizabeth II's death. Gamers wasted no time paying her tribute — in their own way.

title: Twitter whistleblower exposes limits of FTC’s power
description: The FTC currently has a staff of about 40 people monitoring compliance with its many hundreds of consent orders across the economy. Current and former officials say it's not enough.

title: ‘Splatoon 3’ breaks Nintendo’s streak of shunning competitive players
description: Nintendo's Bill Trinen talks "Splatoon 3" online play: "[New] actions like squid roll, new abilities and new weapons … are going to change up your approach[.]”

title: 5 things to try on your iPhone with iOS 16
description: Apple users can now update to a new software, iOS 16. We round up all the key highlights and tell you the most interesting features you may want to try out.

title: Good buy, Type O’s: iMessages can finally be edited and deleted
description: Here’s what you need to know about editing and un-sending iPhone messages with the new iOS 16

title: Blue Origin rocket suffers problem during uncrewed launch
description: No people were on board as the capsule’s emergency abort system kicked in to jettison it away from the booster.

title: ‘Immortality’s’ flawed characters are perfect. The game, less so.
description: What is Sam Barlow's "Immortality" about? Best you draw your own conclusions.

title: Elon Musk’s 19,000 tweets reveal his complicated relationship with Twitter
description: An examination of Elon Musk's 19,000 tweets shows his complicated relationship with Twitter and the billionaire's changing views of the company he's trying to buy.
